content: {"name": "Salvation Army of Lower Bucks", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://easternusa.salvationarmy.org/eastern-pennsylvania/levittown-pa/alleviate-hunger/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "215 Appletree Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Levittown", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19055", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.1591496, "longitude": -74.84070609999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 945-0717", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "18:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "21:30", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No appointment necessary"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
